title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.63 - Oral argument
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.63 - Oral argument

State Regulations
(a) Where oral argument is required under these rules before the Board or a hearing
officer, the Board will notify the parties in writing of the time and place of
argument. (b) If the Board or
hearing officer requires briefs prior to argument, the Board will notify the
parties in writing of the dates for filing such briefs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.63

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
